name: Lens (Darkgun)
description:
Welcome to Lens!  A game in which you try to get a pair of googly eyes through an obstacle course!  To a waiting nose!  Novel!

Default controls (which can be rebound in the menu!):

A and D - Left/Right.

Shift - Switch control to other lens.

Space - Rotate mode!  Stop moving and use A/D to rotate the other lens around you!

A project by Salami Gunship!

Lead Coder: Deor

Lead Artist: Devil Boy

Sound Design, Level Design: Darkgun
